title: mc没法打开了...算是疑难杂症（？）
author: 亓ScarSoul
txt_content:
hmcl生成的crashreport如下：（连启动器都打不开）
--- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Why did you do that?

Time: 3/15/19 8:56 PM
Description: Ticking block entity

java.lang.NullPointerException: Ticking block entity
        at com.Krevik.TileEntity.TileEntityCharger.func_73660_a(TileEntityCharger.java:206)
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72939_s(World.java:1835)
        at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.func_72939_s(WorldServer.java:613)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:767)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:668)
        at net.minecraft.server.integrated.IntegratedServer.func_71217_p(IntegratedServer.java:256)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:526)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

另一个启动器可以打开。。但mc还是开不出，以下是ForgeModLoader-client-0
2019-04-19 10:59:38 [??] [STDERR] Caused by: java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: D:\BaiduNetdiskDownload\???????1.2\.minecraft\bin\natives\lwjgl.dll: Can't find dependent libraries
2019-04-19 10:59:38 [??] [STDERR]         at java.lang.ClassLoader$NativeLibrary.load(Native Method)
2019-04-19 10:59:38 [??] [STDERR]         at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibrary0(Unknown Source)
2019-04-19 10:59:38 [??] [STDERR]         at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibrary(Unknown Source)
2019-04-19 10:59:38 [??] [STDERR]         at java.lang.Runtime.loadLibrary0(Unknown Source)
2019-04-19 10:59:38 [??] [STDERR]         at java.lang.System.loadLibrary(Unknown Source)
2019-04-19 10:59:38 [??] [STDERR]         at org.lwjgl.Sys$1.run(Sys.java:72)
2019-04-19 10:59:38 [??] [STDERR]         at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
2019-04-19 10:59:38 [??] [STDERR]         at org.lwjgl.Sys.doLoadLibrary(Sys.java:65)
2019-04-19 10:59:38 [??] [STDERR]         at org.lwjgl.Sys.loadLibrary(Sys.java:81)

2019-04-19 10:59:38 [??] [STDERR]         at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.fmlReentry(Minecraft.java:2247)
2019-04-19 10:59:38 [??] [STDERR]         ... 7 more



java8 64/32位都试过 java7也试过 且前几天能正常打开

replies.txt_content: 求解答..很困扰 电脑上所有的mc都打不开

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
Can't find dependent libraries
应该是forge的依赖文件损坏了  你重新下一下整合包 然后把旧包的libraries文件夹删除 把新的复制进去

replies.author: 亓ScarSoul
replies.txt_content:
HTL9257 发表于 2019-4-19 14:46
Can't find dependent libraries
应该是forge的依赖文件损坏了  你重新下一下整合包 然后把旧包的libraries ...
压缩包还在 重新解压行吗（重新解压也还是打不开

replies.author: 亓ScarSoul
replies.txt_content:
亓ScarSoul 发表于 2019-4-19 14:53
压缩包还在 重新解压行吗（重新解压也还是打不开
以及 是1.5.2的 没有libraries文件夹

replies.txt_content:

压缩包还在 重新解压行吗（重新解压也还是打不开
其他整合包能打开吗 比如纯净  实在不行用启动器重装forge

卸载java，重新启动电脑，从官网上下载新的java
www.java.com
